metadata.title: CVE-2018-19274 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Passing an absolute path to a file_exists check in phpBB before 3.2.4allows Remote Code Execution through Object Injection by employing Phardeserialization when an attacker has access to the Admin Control Panel withfounder permissions.

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
